TOKEN.description: The bot token, required to run (Remember! The TOKEN value is Super-Secret)

GENIUS_KEY.description: Genius API Key (Used in music and lyrics)

SESSION_SECRET.description: Random sequence of words, letterss or numbers

SECRET.description: The bot client secret (Remember! The SECRET value is Super-Secret), required to run Web Dashboard

ANALYTICS.description: oogle analytics tracking ID, used in Web-Dashboard
